1.

```{r}
read_html("https://taskmaster.fandom.com/wiki/Series_15") |>
  html_element("[data-source^='champion'] > .pi-font") |>
```

2.

```{r}
urls <- paste0("https://taskmaster.fandom.com/wiki/Series_", 1:16)
champions <- rep(NA, 16)
for(i in 1:16){
  champions[i] <- read_html(urls[i]) |>
  html_element("[data-source^='champion'] > .pi-font") |>
  html_text2()
}
champions
```
